content:
# The Stone Furnace has been successfully placed at the coordinates (0.0, 0.0). However, it is currently out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt, which means I need to provide it with both fuel and raw materials to start processing.

# Since I have 10 coal in my inventory, I can use some of that coal to fuel the Stone Furnace. I will insert 5 coal into the furnace to get it started.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert coal into the Stone Furnace
print(f"Inventory after fueling: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after fueling the furnace
